Package splEvolutionCore

Interface SPLEvolutionCore

public interface SPLEvolutionCore
All configuration variables related to evolution core -to configure base evolution configuration entity with constants -to configure optional data extensions inclusions into final derivations
Author:
Jakub Perdek

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    static enum 
    SPLEvolutionCore.CodeIncrementGranularityManagementStrategies
    Strategies used to manage granularity of synthesized content that is represented as various data structures -similarity based - code fragments are merged according to similarity between various types -quantity based - code fragments are merged according to cardinality of their types
    static enum 
    SPLEvolutionCore.DuplicateProductPreventionOptions
    Allows or disallows creation of duplicated product across evolutions
    static enum 
    SPLEvolutionCore.EvolutionStrategies
    Strategies to manage given evolution iteration
    static enum 
    SPLEvolutionCore.ExtractedCallsFromPositiveVariationPointCreatorStrategies
    Strategies to extract calls from variation points
    static enum 
    SPLEvolutionCore.ExtractedCallsInstantiationFromTemplateStrategies
    Strategies to extract calls from template
    static enum 
    SPLEvolutionCore.FeatureConstructsSelectionStrategies
    Strategies to manage callable constructs
    static enum 
    SPLEvolutionCore.FeatureSelectionStrategies
    Strategies to manage variation points selection
    static enum 
    SPLEvolutionCore.NEGATIVE_VARIABILITY_VALUE_ASSIGNMENT_STRATEGIES
    Strategies that can be applied to manage value assignment during use of various measurements related to negative variability
    static enum 
    SPLEvolutionCore.ParameterMatchingStrategyStrategies
    Strategies to manage matching/substitution/insertion of variables based on parameters
    static enum 
    SPLEvolutionCore.POSITIVE_VARIABILITY_VALUE_ASSIGNMENT_STRATEGIES
    Strategies that can be applied to manage value assignment during use of various measurements related to positive variability
    static enum 
    SPLEvolutionCore.SyntetizeConstructsOptions
    Strategies to synthesize constructs
    static interface 
    SPLEvolutionCore.SyntetizeConstructsSelectionBased
    Interface to distinct between selection based synthesis of constructs and other types
    static enum 
    SPLEvolutionCore.SyntetizeConstructsType
    Abstract strategies to synthesize code constructs
    static enum 
    SPLEvolutionCore.VariationPointDivisionConfigurationStrategies
    Strategies to manage the divisions into positive and negative variability in the whole evolution

    APPLY_TO_TEMPLATE
     
    static final String
    CODE_FRAGMENT_SEPARATOR

    Default number of aggregated constructs to select - number of constructs in aggregation

    DEFAULT_NUMBER_OF_FEATURE_CONSTRUCTS_TO_SELECT
    Default number of callable constructs to select for each feature - number of constructs in each VP to select to select code constructs from various VP

    DEFAULT_NUMBER_OF_FEATURES_TO_SELECT
    Default number of features to select - the number of VP that should be processed

    DUPLICATE_PREVENTION_OPTION
    Selected duplicate prevention option
    static final Integer
    NUMBER_DECLARATIONS_TO_INTRODUCE_CLASS
    class can be introduced if number of declarations exceeds this constant

    NUMBER_LINES_TO_CONVERT_METHOD_INTO_CLASS
    class can be introduced if number of lines exceeds this constant
    static final Integer
    NUMBER_LINES_TO_INTRODUCE_METHOD
    method can be introduced if number of appended lines exceeds this constant
    static final Integer
    NUMBER_METHODS_TO_INTRODUCE_CLASS
    class can be introduced if number of declared methods exceeds this constant
    static final SPLEvolutionCore.CodeIncrementGranularityManagementStrategies
    SELECTED_CODE_INCREMENT_GRANULARITY_MANAGEMENT_STRATEGY
    Selected strategy for synthesis of introduced content

    SELECTED_EVOLUTION_STRATEGY

    static final SPLEvolutionCore.FeatureConstructsSelectionStrategies
    SELECTED_FEATURE_CONSTRUCTS_SELECTION_STRATEGY
    Selected strategy to select code callable constructs for each selected variation point

    SELECTED_FEATURE_SELECTION_STRATEGY
    Selected strategy to select positive variation points to insert given content

    Strategies that are applied to manage value assignment during use of various measurements related to negative variability

    SELECTED_PARAMETER_MATCHING_STRATEGY

    SELECTED_POSITIVE_VARIABILITY_CALLS_CREATOR_STRATEGY

    SELECTED_POSITIVE_VARIABILITY_VALUE_STRATEGIES
    Strategies that are applied to manage value assignment during use of various measurements related to positive variability
    static final SPLEvolutionCore.VariationPointDivisionConfigurationStrategies
    SELECTED_VARIATION_POINT_DICISION_CONFIGURATION_STRATEGY
    Selected strategy to manage divisions into positive and negative variability, the number of perceived variation points during search phase (for them)
    static final boolean
    SERIALIZE_APPLICATION_AST
    if true then the resulting AST of derived SPL will be persisted otherwise not
    static final boolean
    SERIALIZE_VARIATION_POINTS
    if true then the resulting variation points sequence of SPL will be persisted otherwise not
    static final SPLEvolutionCore.SyntetizeConstructsOptions
    SYNTETIZE_FEATURE_CONSTRUCTS_OPTION
    Selected strategy to synthesize feature constructs
